original_text: But the Lord continued to be angry with the people of Judah. The wicked things that King Manasseh did had made him very angry.
korean_text: 그러나 여호와께서 유다를 향하여 내리신 그 크게 타오르는 진노를 돌이키지 아니하셨으니 이는 므낫세가 여호와를 격노하게 한 그 모든 격노 때문이라

sentences.original_text: But the Lord continued to be angry
The wicked things that King Manasseh did
